short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Giro allows lending companies and financial technology products to provide banking services to their customers

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Giro allows lending companies and financial technology products to provide banking services to their customers, by providing APIs and plugins that allows users to send money, buy airtime, buy data and pay bills.

Banking services on Giro are powered by Highstreet MFB a financial institution licensed by the Central Bank of Nigeria. 

[Update] - Lenders using LoanDisk can now disburse loans from their LoanDisk dashboard instantly.
